body:
OSS kraken has a dependency on jellyfish@1.1.11.
OSS kraken got a build error on aarch64.

I modified the type of the array dna_codes to signed type.
The array dna_codes is not defined in jellyfish@2.2.7.
The patch is only 1.1.11.
title: jellyfish@1.1.11: Change the type of the array dna_codes to the signed type.
